description: This file demonstrates how to set up and run an agent with personalized memory and summaries using the Mistral model, including database configuration and sample interactions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents the conversational agent configured with model, tools, memory, and storage.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: Handles storage of memories in a PostgreSQL database.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Manages the agent's memory, including database interactions.

classes.name: MistralChat
classes.description: The Mistral language model used for chat interactions.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of session data in PostgreSQL.

methods.name: Agent.print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent based on input prompt.
